ðŸ“– Summary: Savr is a progressive web app (PWA) for saving online content to read later, emphasizing offline access and user data control. It functions as a 'read it later' service that allows users to save articles and other online content for offline viewing, removing distractions like advertisements. Savr can be used as a hosted service or self-hosted, and it supports optional authorization and cross-device synchronization via Dropbox or Google Drive.
